Package com.easy.properties

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigKey
    This thread-safe class acts as a wrapper to the Enum having keys for configuration properties, to achieve customized behavior of Enum
    Corresponding Enum can have below optional fields for this purpose (of behavior customization): String keyName boolean mandatory String defaultValue Note: A getter method following Java naming conventions should also be available for the customization to work
    This means that following methods should also be defined and accessible String getKeyName() boolean isMandatory() String getDefaultValue() If keyName field is not defined, name of the Enum constant is considered as the key name
    Two instances with same key-name are considered to be equal
    EnumFieldInfo
    This is a thread-safe class used to retrieve the value of a specified field in the Enum
    It obtains the value of field using getter method having name according to java-naming conventions
    Properties
    This thread-safe class represents the configuration property and provides several methods for obtaining values defined in property file in various formats
    Some of the key points to note for this class are:
    1) Supports below data types and methods to retrieve configuration value as particular data type
    PropertiesLoader
    This is a thread-safe class used for reading given configuration property file and load the properties in memory based on specified enumeration
    The specified property file must have key and value pairs, separated by "="
    Note: The whitespace surrounding the delimiter is optional and is ignored while determining the values, for example "Role=Developer" and "Role = Developer" are equivalent
    The lines in property file starting with # will be treated as comments and will be ignored
    This class provides the object which can be used to obtain the values present in property file for specified key in enum
